title: The Ocean's Apex Predator
description: Sharks are cartilaginous fish known for their powerful predatory nature, acute senses, and streamlined bodies. They have existed for hundreds of millions of years.

questions.question: What is the collective noun for a group of sharks?
Which of these is a shark's primary sense for hunting?
What is unique about a shark's skeleton?
options: It is made of cartilage, not bone
It is made of a lightweight plastic-like material
It is segmented into many small pieces
questions.correct_answer: It is made of cartilage, not bone

questions.question: How many rows of teeth can a shark have?
Which of the following is the largest known shark species?
